about_the_game:
A Cozy Tower Defense with a Twist!

Unleash your wild side in this thrilling rogue-lite tower defense game! Craft the ultimate deck of animals and strategically place them to create intricate mazes that thwart the advancing hordes. Upgrade and acquire new, powerful creatures between rounds to enhance your defenses, unlocking unique abilities and devastating synergies along the way. With each playthrough, discover fresh strategies and refine your tactics to conquer every wave. Dive into the exhilarating challenge of old-school tower defense infused with the dynamic progression of rogue-lite mechanics, and prove you have what it takes to reach the end!

In Super Animals TD you will:

  • Assemble your perfect deck of animals!
  • Upgrade and unlock tons of animals!
  • Attempt rogue-lite runs with your chosen deck of animals!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400, 3.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+, 3.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A cozy take on the tower defense genre! Maze your enemies by placing animals to act as your towers. Roguelike upgrades and progression!
